channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 12:19 Dumping anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 12:19 Dumping anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.#Kherson_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
